game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.objective: Find the lost treasure and return it to the treasure hunter.
game.description: In the vast jungle, there hides a legendary treasure that has been sought after for centuries. You have been chosen to embark on a quest to find this treasure and return it to the treasure hunter who has dedicated his life to uncovering its secrets.
game.reward: Ancient artifacts and a share of the treasure's value.

task.description: Visit the treasure hunter's camp located at the edge of the jungle.
Find the hidden cave and retrieve the map that leads to the lost treasure.
Navigate through the dense jungle and overcome obstacles to reach the secret temple.
Discover the entrance to the secret temple and solve its riddles and puzzles to progress further.
Search the chambers of the secret temple to find the lost treasure hidden within.

task.objective: Return the treasure to the quest-giver
task.description: Return to the treasure hunter and hand over the found treasure.
